Nashville Zoo says keepers will be giving giraffe Nasha "an abundance of comfort and care for the next few days" after the tragic death of her newborn. After a 15-month pregnancy and a birt… [+1157 chars]

articles.author: Joe Levy
articles.title: Phil Spector Built a Wall of Sound That Couldn't Contain the Monster Within Him - Billboard
articles.description: Phil Spector’s art created the world he couldn’t create for himself: a tortured, toxic and finally murderous man crafting hit after hit about idealized romance
articles.content: But Spector was different. At the start, on The Teddy Bears To Know Him is To Love Him -- a rephrasing of the epitaph from his fathers gravestone that Spector turned into a Hot 100 No. 1 in 1958 -- h… [+8821 chars]
